## ğŸ’¡ Trabajo agregado mÃ¡s recientemente

```{r}
#| echo: false

file_list <- list.files("dissertations/", "*.qmd", recursive = TRUE, full.names = TRUE)

latest_work <- file_list[which.max(file.mtime(file_list))] |> 
  yaml::yaml.load_file() |> 
  purrr::keep_at(c("author", "date", "title"))
```

`r paste0("[",
  latest_work$author$name$family,
  " (",
  substr(latest_work$date, 1,4),
  ") ",
  latest_work$title,
  ". ",
  latest_work$author$affiliations$name,
  "](",
  file_list[which.max(file.mtime(file_list))],
  ")"
)`
